subject: Stanley Cup
Hockey, Ice
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: The Bruins, who will play their 23rd winner-take-all game when they face the Capitals on Wednesday, established a league record last season by winning three Game 7s en route to the Stanley Cup title.
snippet: The Bruins, who will play their 23rd winner-take-all game when they face the Capitals on Wednesday, established a league record last season by winning three Game 7s en route to the Stanley Cup title.
